item.description: A sentencing date has not yet been set.

item.title: Two men kill each other during argument, Hillsborough sheriff’s office says
item.description: Detectives believe the two men began arguing and exchanged gunfire.

item.title: Sarasota County EMTs have new high-tech tool to help save lives
item.description: The ultrasound system allows paramedics to conduct live telemedicine consults in the field.

item.title: Federal Reserve cuts key rate for first time this year
item.description: The Federal Reserve cut its key interest rate by a quarter-point Wednesday.

item.title: Caught on camera: Police stop suspected drunk driver heading wrong way on I-4
item.description: The video shows Beall saying her husband was driving, even though she was alone in the vehicle.

item.title: Hundreds expected for LifeStory 5K/10K to support suicide prevention
item.description: The LifeStory 5K/10K is more than a race. It’s a moment of remembrance, resilience, and hope.

item.title: Coyotes cause concern for local homeowner after killing her cats
item.description: Mary Jo Weidrick now has a device that will sound an alarm and flash lights when anything comes near her house in the night.

item.title: Mosaic & the Tampa Bay Rays partner up on ‘Runs for Food’ in efforts to combat food insecurity
item.description: They are partnering with the Tampa Bay Rays to fight food insecurity through a community impact program.

item.title: New Affordable Housing Communities Coming to Sarasota
item.description: Sarasota County committed $7 million in ARPA funds towards these projects.

item.title: Gabrielle forms and watching 2 other areas
item.description: Things are starting to pick up in the tropics as the 7th named storm of the season has developed
